00179 template<typename T>
00180 inline StatusCode AlgorithmObjectManager<T>::DeleteObject(T *pT)
00181 {
00182     return this->DeleteObject(pT, Manager<T>::m_currentListName);
00183 }

00187 template<typename T>
00188 inline StatusCode AlgorithmObjectManager<T>::DeleteObjects(const ObjectList &objectList)
00189 {
00190     return this->DeleteObjects(objectList, Manager<T>::m_currentListName);
00191 }
